name: GetObjectAttributes
description:
Retrieve a list of attributes for a specific object.

Use this tool to get attributes of an object, such as account name, billing date, etc., by specifying the object type and ID.

parameters.name: object_type_identifier
parameters.description: The ID representing the object type, beginning at 1 for each new type, like 'Companies' or 'Accounts'.

value_schema.description: The object type an object belongs to—like "Companies" or "Accounts". Object type IDs begin at `1` and increment for each new type.

parameters.name: object_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the object, which can be either `object_id` or `cio_object_id`, depending on the id_type specified in query params.

value_schema.description: The `object_id` or `cio_object_id` of an object, depending on the `id_type` specified in query params. `id_type` defaults to `object_id`.

parameters.name: object_id_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of ID used for the object: 'object_id' or 'cio_object_id'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: object_type_id
parameters.description: The object type an object belongs to—like "Companies" or "Accounts". Object type IDs begin at `1` and increment for each new type.

value_schema.description: The object type an object belongs to—like "Companies" or "Accounts". Object type IDs begin at `1` and increment for each new type.

parameters.name: object_id
parameters.description: The `object_id` or `cio_object_id` of an object, depending on the `id_type` specified in query params. `id_type` defaults to `object_id`.

value_schema.description: The `object_id` or `cio_object_id` of an object, depending on the `id_type` specified in query params. `id_type` defaults to `object_id`.
